Title: The Story of Gangstalicious
Plot: Riley's favorite rapper, Gangstalicious, is shot and hospitalized in Woodcrest. When Riley goes to visit the rapper, he finds more than he anticipated ... like maybe rappers that make songs like "Thuggin' Luv" aren't necessarily as tough as they seem. Go figure.
ParentalRatingReason: Offensive language, drug use and sexual content that may offend
GuestStars: James Arnold Taylor (Various),   Sway,   Mos Def (Gangstalicious)
